name: dpltc
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c2, cdp, c3))

stmt.origin: 3brtr4i(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c2, cdp, c3), cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c2, cdp, c3))
-| wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c2, c3))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))
-| wceq(co(c2, cdp, c3), cdp2(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c2, cdp, c3))
-| wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c2, c3))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))
-| wceq(co(c2, cdp, c3), cdp2(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, crp)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c3, crp)
-| wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
-| wbr(c0, clt, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c2, cdp, c3))
-| wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))

-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c3, crp)
-| wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
-| wbr(c0, clt, c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, crp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cdp, c1), clt, co(c2, cdp, c3))

comment: Comparing two decimal integers (unequal higher places). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
